verses.text: Ha heb' kelemtac te tzak'anto t'ayin, tzin stzetzej heb' ticnaik, ocxo t'a yalanhtaxo, a heb' smam heb' manh smojoc yek' heb' yet' nok' in tz'i' stanhwan nok' in kalnel.
Toxonton malaj yip heb', malaj tz'och heb' wuuj.
Yuj wejel yet' mheb'ail, tzek' heb' t'a taquinh lu'um t'ak'walil sch'ocoj, haxo sch'anhal yib'tac te te' sjoyk'eta heb' sk'uxu'.
Slaj stok'k'eta anh comon ank'ultak heb' t'a kaltac te' schi'a, schi'an pax sch'anhal yib' te' meslab' heb'.
Aton juntzanh anima chi' pechb'ilel yuj heb' yetanimail. Ayic spechjib'at heb' chi', tz'el yav heb' spechanb'at heb' chi', icha tz'aj spechji heb' elk'um.
Ha t'a yoltac k'een nhak'een, t'a sattac k'acap yet' t'a sattac k'een tenam, ata' ix laj aj heb'.
Slaj awaj heb' t'a kaltac wayumtac icha yel yav nok' nok', haxo t'a yichtac yoc te' q'uiix slaj smolb'ej sb'a heb'.
Malaj jab'oc tas syal yuj heb', malaj yelk'och heb', pechb'ilel heb' t'a skal heb' anima.
Axo ticnaik tzin sb'uch heb' yuninal heb', syik'anel in q'uixwelal heb'.
Tzin syajan heb', tz'el heb' t'a in tz'ey, stzub'anoch heb' t'a in sat.
Palta a ticnaik, ha Dios ix ik'anel wip, maxtzac yal in colan in b'a, yuj chi' syak' wal snib'ej heb' in yixtani.
Ha heb' anima schichon sk'ol t'ayin, toxonhej sja nhilan heb' yic tzin spechanel heb' snaani, snib'ej heb' tzin sateli.
Smakan yol in b'e heb' yic tzin satanel heb' snaani, manhxa mach skachan heb'.
Sjawi nhilnaj heb' t'ayin, ichato ay junok olan b'aj tz'ochta nhilnaj heb', ma icha ko yamchaj yuj junok ik' nhab'.
Icha wal chi' tz'aj sjawi xivk'olal t'ayin. Ha in b'inajnaquil ix sateli, ichato ix ik'jib'at yuj ik'. Masanil tas ay t'ayin ix satkanel icha asun.
Ha ticnaik wan in chami, maxtzac och waan in yaelal tik.
Ha in yaelal tik sk'och wal t'a yoltac in b'aquil. Max och waan wab'an syail tzek' ak'wal.
Yed' wal yip Dios ichato ix sch'umoch sut'an in pichul t'a in jaj, ix och b'iran t'a in niwanil.
Ix in sjulem t'a kal sok'om. Icha lum pokok, ma k'een tik'aq'uil taanh in ajkan t'a yol sat.
Ach in Diosal, tzin k'an a colwal, palta max ach tak'wi t'ayin. Tzin tewi t'ayach palta maxtzac a cha ab'i.
Chuc tzutej a b'a t'ayin, tzin a pechan yet' yowal a k'ool.
Ichato tzin ik'jik'e waan yuj ik', haxo ik' nhab' tzin tzicub'tanhani.
Vojtakxo to wanxo in ik'anb'at t'a chamel, aton b'aj ol k'ochnhej masanil anima.
Palta ¿tocwal max k'e ch'ikan sk'ab' junok mach ayek' t'a skal syaelal yic sk'anan colwal?
In ok' yuj heb' ayoch t'a syaelal, in kus yuj heb' malaj tas ay t'ay.
Palta haxo ticnaik ayic tzin tanhwan tzalajk'olal, haxo cusk'olal sjawi t'ayin. Tzin tanhwej sakil k'inal, haxo k’ik’ k’inal sjawi.
Toxonhej stinhtinhan in pixan yuj xiwelal, maxtzac yal wik'an jab'oc wip, axonhej yaelal ste ja t'a wib'anh.
Ix ja wal cusk'olal t'ayin, maxtzac wil-laj sakil k'inal. Val t'a yichanh anima tzin k'e waan in k'anan colwal.
Cuseltacxonhej yel wav icha nok' oques, ma icha nok' cujub'.
Ha in tz'umal ix te k'ik'b'ieli, schiwajpax in niwanil yuj k'ak'.
Ha t'a yalanhtaxo, tzin b'itan wal yet' yamk'ab' yic b'it t'a tzalajk'olal, haxo ticnaik, anhej ok'el swak'a'.
